This package contains a collection of models for the dynamics of cytosolic calcium concentrations, the activation of calcium-sensitive proteins, as well as helper functions and experimental data.

The calcium oscillation models implemented are:

- Kummer et al. (2000): a simple 3-variable model
- ...

The calcium-sensitive protein models are:

- Calmodulin
- CaM Kinase II
- Glycogen phosphorylase
- Calcineurin
- ...

This package allows to study the (differential) regulation of proteins by calcium.

## Formatting Examples

The figure sizes have been customised so that you can easily put two images side-by-side. 

```{r, fig.show='hold', fig.cap="This is a figure caption."}
plot(1:10)
#plot(10:1)
```

You can write math expressions, e.g. $Y = X\beta + \epsilon$, footnotes^[A footnote here.], and tables, e.g. using `knitr::kable()`.

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
knitr::kable(head(mtcars, 10))
```
